trends: There have been 126 other sightings in Indianapolis
There was one other sighting in Indianapolis on or around July 6th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was leaving for work and saw this fireball in the sky. I ran in to grab my camara and got a short video of it. It was floating slowly. It appeared to be a hot-air baloon, without the balloon. There was no sound, just a floating fireball. It was dark out, so a bright ball in the sky is not normal. I had to leave for work to get in on time, so I put the camara up and got in the car, intending to further watch the object, but it was gone. It doesn't show on the video because it was so dark, but it had tenticle like objects hanging from it, and reminded me of a jellyfish. I'm a CPA, and I don't believe in things I don't see, but this was something I've never seen before, so I'd like to know what it was!
